example.text: Border Patrol is preparing for up to 18,000 illegal crossings per day once Title 42 ends, but [[user]] is still allowing it to expire this week. This is no longer a crisis, Biden’s open southern border has become an all-out catastrophe.

Republicans are united & so are most Americans around a debt deal that includes commonsense spending cuts & meaningful reform to fix Congress' broken budget process & avoid default. Time for [[user]] to come to the table & negotiate on a responsible solution to the debt ceiling.

Dear , I've been working hard in the United States Senate to protect Montana servicemembers from overreaching COVID-19 vaccine mandates imposed by President Biden's administration. I'm glad to announce that this week, I secured a provision in the defense bill to repeal the mandate for servicemembers!

Allowing the [[user]] to become ground zero for the left’s radical gender ideology by hosting & promoting drag queen performances for children is not just embarrassing, it's a threat to national security and a gross misuse of taxpayer funds. [[url]]
Sincerely, Senator Steve Daines Should Congress ensure Montana servicemembers are protected from overreaching COVID-19 mandates? Yes No Unsure Submit

Dear , In case you missed it, check out my recent interview on Fox News to discuss the Chinese spy balloon that was spotted over Montana and the southern border crisis. The mishandling of the Chinese spy balloon and the southern border are just more examples of projecting weakness on the world stage.

Dear , I've been working hard in the United States Senate to protect Montana servicemembers from overreaching COVID-19 vaccine mandates imposed by President Biden's administration. I'm glad to announce that this week, I secured a provision in the defense bill to repeal the mandate for servicemembers!
